lead_paragraph: President-elect Donald J. Trump has suggested that he will end support, which some groups hope will encourage Saudi Arabia and Turkey to provide more sophisticated weapons.

byline.contributor: Anne Barnard reported from Beirut and Damascus, Syria. Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut and Damascus, Maher Samaan from Paris, and Safak Timur from Istanbul.

headline.print_headline: Syrian Rebels Brace for a Cutoff by Trump
headline.main: Syrian Rebels Brace for a Trump Cutoff, and Look for a Silver Lining

snippet: President-elect Donald J. Trump has suggested that he will end support, which some groups hope will encourage Saudi Arabia and Turkey to provide more sophisticated weapons....
abstract: Syrians reflect on implications of recent victory of American Pres-elect Donald J Trump regarding United States involvement in ongoing civil war.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
